About

Hi, My name is Hanif. Graphic and Type Designer based in Jakarta. i build Monoco Type Foundry as a playground for my experiments in the field of typography. Check out some of my fonts.

Apart from work, I also has an interest in Sino-Muslims culture and enjoy writing articles.

If you want to talk about anything, feel free to email me.

The Website

This site was made on an Apple MBP powered by Jekyll on Github Pages.
